author: {'steamid': '76561198041611973', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1608830968}
review:
Tried to play via the HTC vive and it seems this game is broken or just doesnt work on the vive like it says it does on the store page. Game loads for some reason showing 10pts on the score board even though I havent done anything yet. There is an arrow pointing at one of the toys but you are unable to grab it or interact with anything. Not even the sling. There is no start button. No menu. No means of starting the game. I can close and open my hands but thats it.

So for this reason, its a no from me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198310533302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 489, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1599914575}
review: Вроде и милый визуал и сюжет, если стрельбу из рогатки можно так назвать. Я бы позанималась ерундой. Однако я оказалась внутри ничем не оправданного пустой локации, где до этой рогатки даже не 2, а 2,5 метра. Пришлось просто прошагать вперед. И это, к сожелению, почти выходит за размеры моего игрового пространства. Считаю игру недоработанной. А так красиво.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093205719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1548129986}
review: This game is soo lovely. Being a santa is so much fun. Even though christmas is gone, I feel like I am sending gifts to all the kids who need them. The gifts are designed really well and gameplay is more fun than challenge. Looking for more updates. Wish they will add some new feature next year.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965467305', 'num_games_owned': 5877, 'num_reviews': 312, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1546315786}
review: This could become a fun game. Right now there isnt enough to this game to play it for more than a few minutes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194680793', 'num_games_owned': 3045, 'num_reviews': 1947, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1541497088}
review: Почувствуйте себя в шкуре Санта-Клауса и доставьте все подарки детишкам. Геймплей прост. Запускаем игрушки с рогатки, стараясь попасть в двигающиеся кольца. Поначалу увлекает, но потом начинает приедаться. Всё это выглядит, как некое демо, показывающее возможности VR. На полноценную игру не тянет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056623369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1513370310}
review: This game is disapointing. Not actually a true VR game. The sleight dosn't move - it just stays put. Not fun for more than a few shots!

author: {'steamid': '76561197976892493', 'num_games_owned': 873, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1511642171}
review: Didn't work on Dell Visor VR. You can get into the sleigh, but you can't interact with anything.
developer_response:
Sorry you're having trouble!

We are aware of this issue and will likely fix it at some point in the future, however we do not have any immediate plans to do so. 

We did not mark Santa Sling as compatible with Windows MR for this reason.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003372763', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1483140991}
review: I absolutely love Christmas and the atmosphere I recieved from this game puts me right back into the Christmas spirit. Though the game may be simple it's definetly entertaining, especially when you have friends taking turns. Also launching the wrong presents was amusing :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198001119818', 'num_games_owned': 557, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1488223367}
review:
This is an adorable little game which unfortunately do not seem to work for me. My big fluffy santa hands are unable able to click "continue" or "play again" after I have finished the first few deliveries, and as such my game play is quite limited. 

Another problem is that even though the steam page claims the game only requires 2m x 1.5m play area, the game actually requires a larger play area, my guess being around 2.5m x 2m. Keep this in mind.

However, the game is very cute and I actually find myself feeling like Santa deep inside. It makes me find the generosity and love for children that I did not know I possesed. Delivering my first VR headset was a particular great moment.

Wait a few patches, snatch it on sale and be the worlds most loved person for a night.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020445786', 'num_games_owned': 1090, 'num_reviews': 231, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1487517120}
review:
Warning.... You need need a large play area, make sure you have the required space. 

It's a simple game, it's an easy game, it's a borning game. And it's not worth £5.99. Fortunately I got this in a VR bundle so it was about 50p. Though quite honestly this should be a free game. Kids will enjoy this for a bit, but there really isn't much going on, they'll get bored too. The premise is using the sling to launch the requested presents to the marked house. No  skill needed, a visual arc shows you're shot.

This is one of those VR titles you'll try once, and never come back too.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967574444', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1482453895}
review: This is a cute casual game that is an interesting take on Santa's gift delivery. I'd recommend it if you want a VR game to have up during a social gathering like a Christmas party. It is especially great for children to play and is a good intro to VR for kids since it is not fast paced.

author: {'steamid': '76561198298025584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 398, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1482307974}
review:
《圣诞弹弓》是一款休闲益智类游戏，玩家将在游戏中扮演一位圣诞老人，给城市中的孩子们送去礼物。
　　弹弓游戏也是射击游戏的变种之一，我们之所以将这款游戏定义为“休闲益智”，是因为它的射击元素已经被弱化得几不可见了。游戏的玩法很简单，操作也很简单，制作方甚至画出了一条轨迹线让玩家进行瞄准。
　　玩家在游戏中更多使用的不是操作，而是冷静的判断时机，让抛出的礼物穿过圈圈，获得更高的分数。
　　不过，尽管如此，这款游戏还是很好玩。相信大家每年圣诞节等着礼物的心情都很兴奋，那么自己化身圣诞老人给别人送礼物的体验自不用说，无疑是有趣的。
　　总而言之，这是一款比较有趣的休闲益智游戏，但是想要挑战难度的玩家就不用尝试啦。
http://www.83830.com/game/201612/184006548.shtml
